content: olympic inspiration by angie barrett skill level easy size finished circumference about 18 inches will stretch to fit a range of sizes finished length about 10 inches materials 1 skein crazy sexy wool wool and the gang 1 skein malabrigo rasta gauge 6-7 sts = about 4 inches needle us #15 for your preferred method of working in the round notes hat is worked in one piece in the round your preferred method hat loosely cast on 44 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist round 1 * k1 p1 repeat from * around repeat round 1 until piece measures about 9 ½ - 10 inches from beginning shape crown next round k2tog around 22 sts next round k2tog around 11 sts next round knit the first st then k2tog around 6 sts cut yarn leaving tail draw up remaining 6 stiches to close the top knot securely make a large loose pom pom or your favorite purchased pom pom secure to the top this pattern was designed to match the hat that chloe kim wore at the 2018 winter olympics she became the youngest woman to win an olympic gold medal in snowboarding copyright © knit-paper-scissors / 2022 / for personal use only
